text: The 2008 Canadian Senior Curling Championships was held March 22-30 at the Prince Albert Golf and Curling Club in Prince Albert, Saskatchewan. The winning teams represented Canada at the 2009 World Senior Curling Championships. ==Men's standings== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- !Locale !Skip !W !L |- | || Russ Howard || 9 || 2 |- | || Eugene Hritzuk ||9 || 2 |- | || Brian Rafuse || 9 || 2 |- | || Vic Peters || 8 || 3 |- | || Bruce Delaney || 7 || 4 |- | || Ken McHargue || 7 || 4 |- | || Murray Affleck || 5 || 6 |- | || Ted MacFadyen || 4 || 7 |- | || Gary Oke || 2 || 9 |- |/Northwest Territories || Paul Hunter || 2 || 9 |- | || Bob Genoway || 2 || 9 |- ||| John Stewart || 2 || 9 |} ===Playoffs=== ==Women's== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
